title.description: The title of the panel item

contentPreview.description: The content preview text of the panel item

index.description: Sets the index of the panel item

open.description: Expands the panel item when true

isTopPanel.description: True for the top most panel item in an expansion panel

isBottomPanel.description: True for the bottom most panel item in an expansion panel

isInnerPanel.description: True for the inner panel items in an expansion panel

isSinglePanel.description: True if the expansion panel has a single panel item

belowOpenInnerPanel.description: True for the panel item below an open inner panel in an expansion panel

aboveOpenInnerPanel.description: True for the panel item above an open inner panel in an expansion panel

separateSinglePanel.description: If the panel right below the top panel or right above the bottom panel is opened, the very top or bottom panel becomes a single panel.

showFooter.description: Shows the footer in the panel item

noSurface.description: Sets the theme surface to transparent
